price: para presenciar lo que cometían contra los creyentes,
arabic: وَهُمۡ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفۡعَلُونَ بِٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ شُهُودٞ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: wahum ʿalā mā yafʿalūna bil-mu'minīna shuhūdun
